name: Healer's Bloom
description:
In Healer's Bloom, a doctor experiences the lives of his patients through his own tumultuous memories, exploring his own grief and the role he plays in their lives. 

This game is a story-driven walking simulator. Keys:

A/D or right and left arrow keys to WALK

E to INTERACT

Escape to EXIT THE GAME

This game was created by UCLA students in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49, under the theme "Unstable". 

Story - Mauve Spillard, Susanna Wu, Calvin Nguyen

Programming - Ethan Jackson, Darren Chui, Jeffrey Huang

Art - Evan Ibarra, Jeffrey Huang, Calvin Nguyen

Music - Calvin Nguyen

UI/UI Art - Zoe Chavez
